name: Berger & Argenti - Entubar - Double Corona
additionalNotes: Named for the method in which it is rolled, the Berger & Argenti Entubar is one of the most unique cigars ever made. A classic Cuban method of rolling a cigar, the Entubar is done by rolling the filler tobaccos into tubes, causing the center leaf to extend past the foot of the cigar, creating a “fuse” at the end. The Entubar is a premium smoke that Maduro lovers will truly enjoy. Featuring a blend of Dominican and Nicaraguan long-filler cloaked in an alluring Mexican San Andres Maduro wrapper, this release by Berger and Argenti is back after a 5 year hiatus to revive their most popular cigar in 5 box-pressed sizes.
